Description: Rim sherd of East Greek pottery bowl; interior: glazed black (fired reddish-brown); one added red band probably lined in white; exterior reserved; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIII, no. 344a)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.328)
